plot: A documentary for people who accompany their loved ones at the end of their lives. It has information and testimonies from both palliative care professionals as well as terminal patients and companions.
title: Compañeros De Viaje
plot_es: A documentary for people who accompany their loved ones at the end of their lives. It has information and testimonies from both palliative care professionals as well as terminal patients and companions.
plot_en: A documentary for people who accompany their loved ones at the end of their lives. It has information and testimonies from both palliative care professionals as well as terminal patients and companions.
